scripts.deploy:mmr:local: source ../../../../common/.env.local && bun --env-file=../../../../common/.env.local -e "import {deployMMRToken} from './deploy.js'; deployMMRToken().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1)})"
scripts.deploy:mmr:slot: source ../../../../common/.env.slot && bun --env-file=../../../../common/.env.slot -e "import {deployMMRToken} from './deploy.js'; deployMMRToken().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => {console.error(e); process.exit(1)})"
